languages.text: "Утоляю голод, что превыше телесного — голод любопытства. Лицо человека, его одежда и повадки — маска, дым из уст факира, призванный скрыть истину. Но содержимое сундуков и шкафов — отражение души, в котором мудрому дано прозреть чужое сердце. Мне стало интересно, каков{mf||а} ты".

"Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."
languages.original_text: "Утоляю голод, что превыше телесного — голод любопытства. Лицо человека, его одежда и повадки — маска, дым из уст факира, призванный скрыть истину. Но содержимое сундуков и шкафов — отражение души, в котором мудрому дано прозреть чужое сердце. Мне стало интересно, каков{mf||а} ты".

languages.text: “我在想办法满足比一切肉体欲望都更加强烈的饥渴，那就是我的好奇心。如你所知，一个人的面容、衣着、举止，这一切都只是面具，是喷火艺人吐出来的烟雾，用来掩盖真相。可箱子里和柜子里的东西……这些都是灵魂的倒影，聪明人可以从这些东西之中窥见他人的内心。我一直都很好奇，你究竟是个怎样的人。”
languages.original_text: "Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."

traits.locale_text: “我在想办法满足比一切肉体欲望都更加强烈的饥渴，那就是我的好奇心。如你所知，一个人的面容、衣着、举止，这一切都只是面具，是喷火艺人吐出来的烟雾，用来掩盖真相。可箱子里和柜子里的东西……这些都是灵魂的倒影，聪明人可以从这些东西之中窥见他人的内心。我一直都很好奇，你究竟是个怎样的人。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「どんな肉体的な食欲よりも大きな飢え…あたしの好奇心を満たすためにね。人の顔、服装、態度…それはすべて仮面にすぎないんだ。真実を隠すために作られた、火を噴く者の唇から出る煙。でも、タンスや戸棚の中身は…賢者が他人の心を垣間見ることのできる、魂の反映なんだ。あんたが本当はどんな人なのか、ずっと気になっていたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."

traits.locale_text: 「どんな肉体的な食欲よりも大きな飢え…あたしの好奇心を満たすためにね。人の顔、服装、態度…それはすべて仮面にすぎないんだ。真実を隠すために作られた、火を噴く者の唇から出る煙。でも、タンスや戸棚の中身は…賢者が他人の心を垣間見ることのできる、魂の反映なんだ。あんたが本当はどんな人なのか、ずっと気になっていたんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Saciar un hambre mayor que mis apetitos carnales: mi curiosidad. Verá: la cara de una persona, sus ropas, su forma de ser... todo eso es solo una máscara. Humo que brota de los labios de un escupefuego para ocultar la verdad. Sin embargo, el contenido de los armarios y los cofres... es un reflejo del alma, a través del cual los sabios pueden ver el corazón de otra persona. Me estaba preguntando qué clase de persona es en realidad».
languages.original_text: "Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."

traits.locale_text: «Saciar un hambre mayor que mis apetitos carnales: mi curiosidad. Verá: la cara de una persona, sus ropas, su forma de ser... todo eso es solo una máscara. Humo que brota de los labios de un escupefuego para ocultar la verdad. Sin embargo, el contenido de los armarios y los cofres... es un reflejo del alma, a través del cual los sabios pueden ver el corazón de otra persona. Me estaba preguntando qué clase de persona es en realidad».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis venue satisfaire une soif plus grande encore que celle qui accable le voyageur perdu en plein désert : ma curiosité. Voyez-vous, le visage d'une personne, ses vêtements, ses gestes... Tout ça n'est qu'un masque, un écran de fumée conçu pour masquer la vérité. Mais le contenu d'un tiroir ou d'un placard... C'est là que l'on trouve le véritable reflet de l'âme, là que les plus avisés peuvent entrapercevoir le cœur de quelqu'un. Il se trouve que je me demandais quel genre de personne vous étiez vraiment. »
languages.original_text: "Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis venue satisfaire une soif plus grande encore que celle qui accable le voyageur perdu en plein désert : ma curiosité. Voyez-vous, le visage d'une personne, ses vêtements, ses gestes... Tout ça n'est qu'un masque, un écran de fumée conçu pour masquer la vérité. Mais le contenu d'un tiroir ou d'un placard... C'est là que l'on trouve le véritable reflet de l'âme, là que les plus avisés peuvent entrapercevoir le cœur de quelqu'un. Il se trouve que je me demandais quel genre de personne vous étiez vraiment. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich stille einen Hunger, der stärker ist als jede körperliche Begierde – meine Neugier. Man kann das Gesicht einer Person erblicken, ihre Kleidung, ihr Auftreten – aber solche Sachen sind nur eine Maske, Rauch aus dem Mund eines Feuerspuckers, der die Wahrheit verschleiern soll. Aber was sich in Kisten und Schränken findet lässt ... bilden das Spiegelbild der Seele ab, in dem der Weise einen flüchtigen Blick auf das Herz einer Person erhaschen kann. Und ich frage mich schon, was für eine Person Ihr wirklich seid."
languages.original_text: "Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stille einen Hunger, der stärker ist als jede körperliche Begierde – meine Neugier. Man kann das Gesicht einer Person erblicken, ihre Kleidung, ihr Auftreten – aber solche Sachen sind nur eine Maske, Rauch aus dem Mund eines Feuerspuckers, der die Wahrheit verschleiern soll. Aber was sich in Kisten und Schränken findet lässt ... bilden das Spiegelbild der Seele ab, in dem der Weise einen flüchtigen Blick auf das Herz einer Person erhaschen kann. Und ich frage mich schon, was für eine Person Ihr wirklich seid."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Her türlü fiziksel arzudan daha büyük bir açlığı, yani merakımı bastırma isteğim. Bir insanın yüzü, kıyafeti, davranışı... Hepsi sadece bir maskedir, ağzından alev saçan birinin gerçeği gizlemek için yarattığı bir dumandır. Ama sandıkların ve dolapların ihtiva ettiği şeyler... Onlar ruhun birer yansımasıdır. Bilge biri, bunlar sayesinde başka birinin kalbinin içine bakış atabilir. Senin aslında nasıl bir insan olduğunu merak ediyordum."
languages.original_text: "Sating a hunger greater than any bodily appetite — my curiosity. You see, a person's face, their clothes, their manner — it's all just a mask, smoke from the lips of a fire-breather designed to hide the truth. But the contents of chests and cupboards... they are the reflection of the soul, in which the wise can glimpse another's heart. I have been wondering what kind of person you truly are."

traits.locale_text: "Her türlü fiziksel arzudan daha büyük bir açlığı bastırma isteğim. Merakımı yani. Malum, bir insanın yüzü, kıyafeti, davranışı, hepsi sadece bir maskedir, ağzından alev saçan birinin gerçeği gizlemek için yarattığı bir dumandır. Ama sandıkların ve dolapların ihtiva ettiği şeyler... Onlar ruhun birer yansımasıdır. Bilge biri bunlar sayesinde başka birinin kalbinin içine bakış atabilir. Senin aslında nasıl bir insan olduğunu merak ediyordum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
